message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its high value and potential impact, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive features and benefits we are confident you will appreciate.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. While I appreciate the value of the product, I am looking to stay within my budget. I am willing to pay up to $8500 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To find a middle ground, I am proposing an adjusted price of $9500 for the product. This still maintains a fair profit margin for us while considering your financial situation. I hope this offer meets your expectations.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to meet my budget constraints. However, I would like to counter with an offer of $9000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. Considering the value of the product and aiming to reach a mutually beneficial agreement, I am proposing a final offer of $9200 for the product. I hope this aligns well with your budget and expectations.
